entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
